languages.text: This creature has increased {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and deals more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

この生物の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}が上昇し、より多くの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。

traits.locale_text: この生物の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}は増加し、より多くのダメージを与える。

languages.text: 此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}提高，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高。

traits.locale_text: 此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}提高，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高。

languages.text: Esta criatura tiene más {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}de proyectiles{/g} e inflige más {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature has increased {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and deals more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura tiene más {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}HA{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}HP{/g} e inflige más daño.

languages.text: Diese Kreatur hat erhöhte {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} und verursacht mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature has increased {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and deals more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur hat erhöhte {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WF{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BF{/g} und verursacht mehr Schaden.

languages.text: Cette créature bénéficie d'une {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et d'une {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} améliorées. En outre, elle inflige plus de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature has increased {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and deals more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cette créature bénéficie d'une {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et d'une {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} améliorées. En outre, elle inflige plus de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, artırılmış {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} niteliklerine sahiptir. Ayrıca daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
